entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Summerside 2:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %

Wind: SSE 28 km/h gust 41 km/h

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain near noon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
